meanings.definition: A type of isoflavone found in soy products.
meanings.sent1: Soy milk contains daidzeins that are good for health.
meanings.sent2: I added daidzeins to my stir-fry for extra nutrition.
meanings.sent3: The daidzeins in the tofu were having a dance party in my stomach.
meanings.sent4: Her blood was like a river flowing with daidzeins, nourishing her body.
meanings.sent5: The daidzeins in the soy sauce painted a rainbow of health benefits in her mind.
